content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=unknown)
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5), chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and small electric pole at position(x=2.5, y=1.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 17462

### Pipe group at position(x=-8.5, y=22.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 17466 and fluid water

### Electricity group at position(x=unknown)
Consists of electricity group with id 12383 and poles at positions [(x=8.5,y=9.5),(x=4.5,y=5.5),(x=2.5,y=2.5),(x=2.5,y=1.5)]

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to have enough fuel in the inventory before using burner entities
-  Ensure that the burner entity has a fuel source before attempting to use it

### Errors when using entities that require input
-  Make sure to have the required input items in the inventory before using entities that require input
-  Ensure that the entity has a connection to the input items before attempting to use it

### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
-  Make sure to have a fluid source connected to the offshore pump before attempting to use it
-  Ensure that the offshore pump has a connection to a fluid system before attempting to use it

### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Make sure to have a liquid source connected to the steam engine before attempting to use it
-  Ensure that the steam engine has a connection to a fluid system before attempting to use it

### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Make sure to have the required ingredients in the inventory before using furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace has a connection to the ingredients before attempting to use it

### Errors when using inserter but having no source items
-  Make sure to have the required items in the inventory before using inserter
-  Ensure that the inserter has a connection to the items before attempting to use it
